description: Ground truth corpus for sprite direction detection

sprites.name: Green-Cap-Character
sprites.author: isaiah658
sprites.notes: Non-standard layout. Top-down perspective makes directions subtle.

sprites.name: Gnome-Male-Green-Hat
sprites.author: AntumDeluge
sprites.notes: Standard NESW layout (North/East/South/West). Upscaled from Green Cap 16x18. Clear directional distinctions.
sprites.verified_method: Visual inspection - NESW filename indicates layout

sprites.name: Gnome-Female-Green-Hat
sprites.author: AntumDeluge
sprites.notes: Standard NESW layout. Female gnome variant with green hat.
sprites.verified_method: Visual inspection - NESW filename indicates layout

sprites.name: Gnome-Soldier
sprites.author: AntumDeluge
sprites.notes: Standard NESW layout. Soldier variant with armor/weapon.
sprites.verified_method: Visual inspection - NESW filename indicates layout

sprites.name: Chicken-White
sprites.author: daneeklu
sprites.notes: LPC-style chicken sprite. Row 0=Down (chest visible), Row 1=Left, Row 2=Right, Row 3=Up (tail visible).

sprites.name: Chicken-Light-Brown
sprites.author: daneeklu
sprites.notes: LPC-style chicken sprite (brown variant). Same layout as white chicken.

sprites.name: Hero-16x16
sprites.author: ArMM1998 (based on work by Cough-E)
sprites.notes: Zelda-style hero sprite. 8 frames per direction. Row 0=Down (face visible), Row 1=Left, Row 2=Right, Row 3=Up (back visible).

notes: All sprites are from OpenGameArt.org and properly attributed.
Ground truth values indicate row indices (0-based) for each direction.
Standard NESW layout: Row 0=Up, Row 1=Right, Row 2=Down, Row 3=Left
Green Cap uses non-standard layout: Row 0=Down, Row 1=Up, Row 2=Left, Row 3=Right
